search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for PhoneBurner (phoneburner.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for PhoneBurner is available at: [https://www.phoneburner.com/pricing](https://www.phoneburner.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing | PhoneBurner
===============
     

[![Image 1: PhoneBurner Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/61956e73c1edd1103ebabe51_phoneburner-logo-dark.svg)](https://www.phoneburner.com/)

Features

[![Image 2: ARMOR icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/669ed05d32a90ff0e4930804_armor-icon-orange.svg) ARMOR® Fewer spam flags. More calls answered.](https://www.phoneburner.com/armor)[![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd46be798d52008e97e4_hand-point-right-solid.svg) Platform Get to know PhoneBurner](https://www.phoneburner.com/platform)[![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd4675cc912552f74e1e_phone-solid.svg) Power Dialer Dial 4x faster, smarter, and delay-free](https://www.phoneburner.com/power-dialer)[![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/62ed19c2f6c55f5c325fbc81_diagram-project-solid.svg) Cadence Create repeatable follow-up sequences](https://www.phoneburner.com/features/cadence)[![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd463228e7b10d49b8e6_address-card-solid.svg) CRM Manage contacts and call campaigns](https://www.phoneburner.com/homepage/sales-crm)[![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/628e2f61bbbd26eebba60ee4_phone-volume-solid.svg) Call Deliverability Optimize calls and live answer rates](https://www.phoneburner.com/features/call-deliverability)[![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd463008a8ab16f0281b_envelope-solid.svg) Workflow Automation Tedious tasks, done for you](https://www.phoneburner.com/homepage/workflow-automation)

[![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd46ab885f3d1689cf3f_chart-bar-solid.svg) Reporting & Analytics The tools you need for data-driven decisions](https://www.phoneburner.com/analytics)[![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd4675cc912552f74e1e_phone-solid.svg) Virtual Phone Service Enhancing calling, SMS, voicemail and more](https://www.phoneburner.com/homepage/inbound)[![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd46733ba11dbb3fb2eb_globe-americas-solid.svg) Remote Dialing Reach prospects from anywhere](https://www.phoneburner.com/homepage/remote-dialing)[![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd4665112e85ed993c6e_sitemap-solid.svg) Lead Distribution The right leads to the right agents, automatically](https://www.phoneburner.com/homepage/lead-distribution)[![Image 13: Location icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/63896a9cadcfdbf3c33eaf62_location_on-orange.svg) Local Presence Dynamically display a local number](https://www.phoneburner.com/features/local-presence)[![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd4630344efbbd7916a9_comments-solid.svg) Text Messaging Boost outreach efforts with SMS](https://www.phoneburner.com/homepage/sms-text-messaging)[![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd463228e715f449b8e7_hands-helping-solid.svg) Collaborative Onboarding Expert help that drives fast results](https://www.phoneburner.com/onboarding)

[Integrations](https://www.phoneburner.com/integrations)[Pricing](https://www.phoneburner.com/pricing)

Learn

[![Image 16: Unblocked: Sales show logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/672bbe9ae986bfc497e662b0_unblocked-logo-white.svg) Unblocked: Sales Show](https://www.phoneburner.com/unblocked)[![Image 17: App icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/638a5ec589536d3d710773b5_web-orange.svg) Blog](https://www.phoneburner.com/blog)[![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/638a5f4ceb122b80ede00af9_videocam-orange.svg) Webinars](https://www.phoneburner.com/webinars)[![Image 19](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/638a5f8016ef839c17650685_format_quote-orange.svg) Customer Stories](https://www.phoneburner.com/customers)[![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6388d4c5b748af40299d906e_phone_in_talk-orange.svg) Responsible Communications™](https://www.phoneburner.com/responsible-communications)[![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6388d9086baec04dfcd60180_voicemail-orange.svg) Live Voicemail](https://www.phoneburner.com/industry-updates/live-voicemail/ios)[![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/638a605e016a3d02f1b62c4f_info-orange.svg) Support](https://www.phoneburner.com/homepage/support)[![Image 23](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6197cd4636cf9f5ca2a152fa_question-circle-solid.svg) FAQ](https://www.phoneburner.com/faq)

[Log In](https://www.phoneburner.com/homepage/login)

[(888) 369-9131](tel:+1(877)588-2292)[Log In](https://www.phoneburner.com/homepage/login)[Start Free](https://www.phoneburner.com/trial_form)

![Image 37: Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/63896bcf48095be0a600c857_check_circle-green.svg)Priority Support

Boost Answer Rates with Add-Ons
-------------------------------

![Image 38: PhoneBurner fire logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/67576506c7282340ae726a61_pb-mark.svg)

Numbers

Add-on

PhoneBurner numbers enhance your call experience with dedicated lines for agents and campaigns, delivering higher-quality connections for both inbound and outbound calls.

Includes

![Image 39: Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/63896bcf48095be0a600c857_check_circle-green.svg)Callback Management

![Image 40: Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/63896bcf48095be0a600c857_check_circle-green.svg)Improved Call Quality

![Image 41: Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/63896bcf48095be0a600c857_check_circle-green.svg)Call Analytics

![Image 42: ARMOR icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/6688077c9b86d0be61309654_armor-icon-black.svg)

ARMOR®

Add-on

ARMOR® protects your numbers from false flags with comprehensive number monitoring, remediation, and answer rate analytics—so you can focus on driving more conversations and use insights to improve performance.

Includes

![Image 43: Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/63896bcf48095be0a600c857_check_circle-green.svg)Reduced Spam Risk

![Image 44: Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/63896bcf48095be0a600c857_check_circle-green.svg)Done-for-you Remediation

![Image 45: Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6144f395296d182738857698/63896bcf48095be0a600c857_check_circle-green.svg)Cutting-edge Analytics

Integrate with the tools you love
---------------------------------

[Start Free Trial](https://www.phoneburner.com/trial_form)

FAQs
----

How does the free trial work?  

Get free minutes to test-drive the dialer, plus resources and support to determine if PhoneBurner meets your needs. Evaluating for a team? Get a custom demo and expanded trial for your agents. No-pressure sales and expert onboarding ensure a seamless transition from evaluation and decision to a successful launch.

Do you include a CRM?  

Sure do. PhoneBurner's CRM helps agents manage contacts and perform coordinated follow-up via calls, emails, and SMS. Maintain detailed contact records and automatically track communications and activity history.

Can I integrate with my CRM?

Absolutely. Through integrations with Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, Zoom, Zapier, and many other tools, as well as our open API, PhoneBurner can integrate with virtually any CRM.

How do I manage my team?  

Manage your entire team from a dedicated admin portal. Remove and edit seats, set permissions, distribute leads, run reports, engage in live call monitoring and coaching, and push configurations to get agents up and running quickly.

What kind of support is offered?

Software is only as good as the team supporting it. Our in-house, US-based team will wow you with their knowledge and genuine desire to help. From no-pressure sales to expert support and onboarding to video-based training, you'll be fully supported from day one.

Who uses PhoneBurner?  

PhoneBurner powers millions of monthly conversations for thousands of clients. From SMBs to enterprise, we serve customers in financial services, insurance, mortgage, solar, IT, software, and many other industries.
